lead_paragraph: The problem of teaching American history that is politically correct might be resolved by splitting the course in two. Separate political history from cultural history. If it's properly taught, no group would get short shrift -- and the Eurocentric philosophy that has inspired our Government for most of the last two centuries could be portrayed in an accurate context. HENRY WEIL New York, N.Y.
